children.text:
Drinking Water is an app that reminds you to drink water and tracks your drinking habits.

Set the number of cups you need/want to drink each day and Drinking Water will notify you during the day it is time to drink a cup of water.

Notifications are spread equally over the whole day according to the settings (number of cups and start/end time).
Notifications stop when reaching day target and will restart next day on the start hour

Turn your phone horizontally and you will get a graph of the number of cups you drank each day. Turn it back vertically and you are back on the cups screen.

Main screen:

- Click an empty cup for every cup of water you drink during the day
- Use the arrows to navigate to previous days
- Click the date to jump to a specific date
- Turn phone horizontal to get a graph of number of cups you drank each day
- Long press on a cup will change its time
- You can use the Statistics menu to view the graph vertically (without turning phone)
- Backup is used to copy the DB file to the SD card. You can use restore to import it to another version
- Note: clicking a cup will remove current active notification

Settings:

- Number of cups - Set the number of cups per day (4-16)
- Start hour - Notifications start time
- End hour - No notifications after this time
- Start on boot - start notifications when phone starts (application will not start)
- Notifications on/off - turn notifications on/off
- Snooze time - number of minutes of the reminder snooze
- Sound on/off - turn notifications sound on/off
- Use custom sound - use one of Android system sound instead of the default.
Use the default sound, it will make you want to drink :)
- Vibration on/off - notification vibration on/off
- Number on notification - toggle showing on notification icon the number of cups you drank today
- Applause - applause sound on/off when reaching day target

Disclaimer:

THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS".
IN NO EVENT SHALL THE DEVELOPER BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT,INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES IN HEALTH OR IN ANY OTHER WAY.
DRINKING WATER IS THE SOLE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE USER.
